reviews.title: Very good but could be excellent
reviews.text: We went here for a couple of days in November. The hotel is beautiful and the staff very helpful. The location is also spot on. The indoor pool is lovely and all public areas spotlessly clean.
My only reason for marking it very good and not excellent is because of only two things:
reviews.title: Work and pleasure combined

reviews.text: The bedroom walls are extremely thin and I'm not convinced they have ANY sound deadening. We spent one evening at midnight listening to next doors TV. You could honestly hear not only what they were watching but actually the dialogue. Not good
reviews.title: Scenic, clean, top quality!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant is excellent but the chef really needs to hurry up. It wasn't that busy when we went but we waited nearly and hour and a half from starter to main. I know it is all fresh and of excellent quality but this is simply not acceptable.
reviews.title: Highly recommended
Perfect romantic break
reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights this week as part of a group event. Half the group had a "Strategy Awayday" in a meeting room. This had good technical facilities and regular supplies of tea and coffee. The partners spent the day exploring or using the facilities of the hotel. Two good dinners, one in the main restaurant and the other a private affiar in the Seaside Restaurant. Both recommended. All in all, a high class establishment with friendly and welcoming staff.
